com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud

Class HUDComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.hud.HUDComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IFixedComponent, IPopup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListComponent

    public abstract class HUDComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFixedComponent
    Base class for HUD components.
